issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: Minio is already installed in the base (e.g. ubuntu-cpp) image, there's no point in reinstalling it (especially as the download server can be slow from some places).

comments.body: Could make install_minio.sh skip installation if `which minio` returns true, what do you think?
